inlineContent.text: RAWGKit provides a comprehensive, type-safe Swift SDK for accessing the RAWG Video Games Database API. Built with modern Swift features like async/await, actors, and strict concurrency checking, it offers a robust and efficient way to integrate game data into your iOS, macOS, watchOS, tvOS, and visionOS applications.
: Access all RAWG API endpoints for games, platforms, genres, developers, publishers, stores, tags, and creators
: Fully typed responses with Codable models and compile-time safe query filters
: Built with async/await and AsyncSequence for clean asynchronous code
: Thread-safe networking with Swift’s actor model and automatic request deduplication
: Pre-built ViewModels, components, and a complete demo application
: Supports iOS 15+, macOS 13+, watchOS 8+, tvOS 15+, and visionOS 1+
: In-memory NSCache with TTL and automatic memory management
: Configurable retry policy with exponential backoff
: Certificate pinning, TLS enforcement, and Keychain storage for API keys
